Everything else (Chrome, Pandora) didn't work.Returned this and hope Google can work harder to ship products that work. Very poor engineering, they have lots to improve with becoming a device + sw company.

review: I now own three of these devices.  One for each TV in the house. It is a great way to make your old TV into a smart TV.  I use it to stream Youtube videos, local media using Plex, and music to my sterea system using various music apps which support casting to this device.  I like it so much I have started purchasing these devices for family members.
